p: Zika, Chikungunya, and Dengue fever cases were recorded in approximately 95% of neighborhoods analyzed in the municipality of Salvador. The analysis of kernel maps ( Figure 3) and choropleth maps suggested that the spatial diffusion process of Zika fever occurred through expansion, as did Dengue and Chikungunya fevers. Some areas of the municipality, mainly in the west/southwest region, showed an emergence of cases that then intensified and reached nearby regions.
